name: Zerqa Ma'in
description:
Introduction

Hot water, nice for half day hike,

Approach

it's the lower trail, so you start and end at the same point.

Descent

be careful with some scrambling and climbing down the 6-meter rock after going back.

Exit

Red tape

Don't jump in any pool, a lot of accidents happened in that canyon. Don't underestimate it.

Beta sites
